overview: Grizzly Adams (Dan Haggerty) and his friends celebrate a very special Christmas in "Once Upon A Starry Night", a heartwarming tael for the entire family.  Frontier woodsman James "grizzly" Adams happens upon a young boy and girl, traveling to meet their parents.  Lost and cold in unfamiliar territory, Adams guides them to the warmth and safety of his cabin, but will he be a able to do the same for the children's parents?  Grizzly Must use all of his abilities and instincts in order to save the day and allow them to join in the celebration.
title: Once Upon a Starry Night
